home.title: The Stars of the Rock
home.subtitle: Your haven of peace on the French Riviera

content.quote: « There are places where the spirit breathes. »
content.description1: Some places possess a rare soul, a silent energy that inspires and soothes. Our estate is the perfect illustration: located just 5 minutes from the Monegasque effervescence, it offers absolute tranquility while providing immediate access to the most beautiful beaches, luxury boutiques, and events on the French Riviera.
content.description2: Enjoy 350 m² spread over two floors, with five private suites featuring exceptional bedding. A discreet guesthouse, nestled in Mediterranean vegetation, offers additional space for your guests.
content.description3: Discover our infinity pool overlooking the sea and our rooftop offering an exceptional panorama of Monaco and the Mediterranean.
content.description4: Between intimacy, elegance, and the art of living, our estate is the ideal address for a unique getaway on the Riviera.
